methods.name: public Builder setTitle(@NonNull CharSequence title)
methods.comment: Sets the title for this status.

methods.name: public Builder setSummary(@NonNull CharSequence summary)
methods.comment: Sets the summary text for this status.

methods.name: public Builder setSeverityLevel(@OverallSeverityLevel int severityLevel)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link OverallSeverityLevel} of this status. Defaults to {@link
         * #OVERALL_SEVERITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN}.

methods.name: public Builder setRefreshStatus(@RefreshStatus int refreshStatus)
methods.comment: * Sets the {@link RefreshStatus} of this status. Defaults to {@link #REFRESH_STATUS_NONE}.

methods.name: public SafetyCenterStatus build()
methods.comment: Creates the {@link SafetyCenterStatus} defined by this {@link Builder}.
